post.text: We face a serious choice on Tuesday: Will we act to protect the planet for our kids and grandkids, or do nothing? hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Corey
comment.text: Are any of Trump supporters on his page?? lol I honestly don't think highly of Trump for my own reasons , but I have never been on his page. Why do you live on the page of someone you dislike so much ?

replies.author: Brianna
replies.text: Because sheeps like you can't do your own research so we help you

replies.author: Arie
replies.text: That's because you Hillary supporters are so closed minded. I dare you to watch two or three of Trump's latest speeches. Better yet, research his 100 day plan and his 7 point plan for improving inner cities. What are you afraid of?

replies.author: Corey
replies.text: Yeah that's the reason why. lol. it's because I can't get that 5 minutes of my life back. Trump doesn't even support free speech. He called for a protester to be beat up , said he likes the good old days when they would take that person out back and beat them. He even told a woman to get her crying baby out of his event. She was HIS supporter. The guy has to be the worst possible candidate for anything , in the history of anything. I wouldn't vote for him to manage my sock draw. But if this country is so bad and has been so bad , why are you still here complaining??? They have boats and planes, go somewhere else.

replies.author: Brianna
replies.text: Trump doesn't support free speech? Lmfao your a joke
